projects.title: Pearlite Phase Analyser
projects.subtitle: Microstructural Computer Vision Tool
projects.description: Developed an independent software solution to remove subjectivity from pearlite quantification in steel alloys. Built using a full Python stack (PyQt5, Pillow, QPainter) with automated PDF report generation via ReportLab.

projects.title: Live AI Mineral Identifier
projects.subtitle: Deep Learning Web Application
projects.description: Built a real-time mineral identification system using an EfficientNet-B3 model trained on 18,000+ images. Achieved 73.22% accuracy on messy, real-world data and deployed via a Gradio web interface.
